abstract: The Deal Professor takes a close look at Pepsi’s hostile bids for its former bottling subsidiaries, as well as those two companies’ efforts to fight back.
snippet: The Deal Professor takes a close look at Pepsi’s hostile bids for its former bottling subsidiaries, as well as those two companies’ efforts to fight back.
lead_paragraph: Indra Nooyi is known for her aggressive management style as PepsiCo‘s chief executive. So, it was no surprise when Pepsi suddenly sent two bear-hug letters offering to acquire its two large bottlers and business partners, Pepsi Bottling Group and Pepsi Americas, respectively.

headline.main: A Close Look at Pepsi’s Bottling Shake-Up
